basics.name: Shishir Amin
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Pragmatist. DevOps, automation and CICD enthusiast. Post sales consultant. Lifelong learner and personable team player. Flexible and always willing to dig in and solve new problems.

highlights: Led technical implementation & operations of large-scale validation lab.
Automated deployment & validation of a wide product mix in complex customer focused topologies including all layers from physical to containers.
Led initiative around process and technical improvements on a widely-used internal product.
Technical enablement with customers to teach them to fully deploy, automate, manage and operate their PaaS environments.
Performed troubleshooting of complex issues that arose with Cloud Foundry and Kubernetes platforms.
Provided early experience & bug reports to product development teams through direct customer feedback.
Managed Openstack and Mesos using Salt and Ansible.
Managed CICD infrastructure (TeamCity) and evangalized best practices.
Deployed, configued and supported internal cloud platforms and mission critical shared services.
Used automation to collect benchmarks and run tests against deployed clouds to help identify and fix performance issues and bugs.
Added features to improve customer experience and increased stability through bug fix for an internal Java PaaS.
Cross-team collaboration with other shared services, customers of the product and other development groups within the bank.
Developed virtual hardware environments of EMC Midrange storage platforms which helped reduce hardware costs for development.
Automated deployment and configuration of virtual hardware environments on vCenter.
Assisted the Midrange NAS development team with their development responsibilities.
Managed lab hardware and developed/maintained the lab hardware tracking software.
